channel.title: VULNHUB on Pylon
channel.description: Recent content in VULNHUB on Pylon

item.title: DarkHole 2
item.description: Enumeration Vamos a empezar escaneando la red local: ┌──(pylon㉿kali)-[~/…/pylon/Vulnhub/DarkHole2/nmap] └─$ sudo arp-scan -I eth0 --localnet [sudo] password for pylon: Interface: eth0, type: EN10MB, MAC: 00:0c:29:9e:99:b0, IPv4: 192.
